scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --workspace @spritematic/backend" "npm run dev --workspace @spritematic/frontend"

scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @spritematic/backend && npm run lint --workspace @spritematic/frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace @spritematic/backend && npm run format --workspace @spritematic/frontend
